actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of 1 additional Federal district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Directs: (1) the President, by and with the consent of the Senate, to appoint an additional district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin; and (2) the chief judge of that district to designate a judge who shall hold court for such district in Green Bay, Wisconsin.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of 1 additional Federal district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.
